executiveSummary: Joel Pennington, founder and CEO of Black Dot, pitched his company on Shark Tank seeking $1.5 million for 5% equity. Black Dot developed an automatic tattooing device paired with a digital marketplace for licensed tattoo art. Despite strong innovation and patented technology, the Sharks declined to invest due to an unclear business plan, high production costs, and early-stage development.
